### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) which is currently working and has an inventory containing iron-ore.

### Stone furnace at position (3.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (3.0, 0.0)) which currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- No copper plate mine has been established yet.

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (not explicitly mentioned but inferred from crafting logs) that crafts iron gear wheels using iron plates.

### Updated Stone Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) which is currently working and has an inventory containing iron-ore.

### Updated Stone Furnace at position (3.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (3.0, 0.0)) which is currently empty and has no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing resources
- Ensure you gather all required resources before attempting to craft items. For example, the stone-furnace requires stone to be gathered first.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. For instance, ensure you have iron-ore before inserting it into the stone furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors when trying to craft with insufficient inventory
- Keep track of your inventory and ensure you have enough items to craft the desired quantity of products.

### Errors when extracting from furnaces with no ingredients
- Check the inventory of the furnace before attempting to extract items. Ensure that the furnace has produced items before extraction.
